projects.title: Rubik's Cube Competition Simulator
projects.description: Noticing a lack of tools helping cubers prepare for a competition, I develop this program which allows a user to race against simulated versions of other cubers in a WCA-formatted round

projects.title: Drift Fever
projects.subtitle: Car Racing Simulation Game
projects.description: Made a game with a partner using the MVC architectural pattern. This project introduced me to important SWE practices such as Continuous Integration via GitLab, using design patterns and unit testing

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.subtitle: for Post-Production Specialist
projects.description: Developed an upgraded version of a portfolio website for my friend. Improvements included making it responsive and gave it a more unique look through things such as animations

projects.title: Gunslinger
projects.subtitle: 2-Player Shooting Game
projects.description: A game developed on the UC Fun Kit (a microcontroller designed by UC) using infrared to communicate between two boards

projects.title: Deadly Fight
projects.subtitle: 2D Fighting Game
projects.description: Inspired by the new upcoming Mortal Kombat 1, I decided to make my own fighting game. Improved my understanding of OOP and the process behind game development
